channel.title: Mg(9) on LS | Papermod
channel.description: Recent content in Mg(9) on LS | Papermod

item.title: Homeless in Seattle, Part 1
item.description: A man gets caught playing with his daughter, and is forced to live out on his own -- homeless. Eventually a situation presents itself nearly gift wrapped.

item.title: Chloe Becomes a Model and More, Part 1
item.description: Chloe is a 9 year girl old who meets an older man and is persuaded to become a model, but she'll also become a lot more than that. This is the beginning of a multiple part story.

item.title: The Little Monkey
item.description: A story of a neighbor girl who pretends to be a monkey, and the man who fancies to her. This is the third story in my 'little animal' series, which began with 'The Little Kitty-Cat' and continued with 'The Little Puppy-Dog'; This story can be read by itself or you can start with 'The Little Kitty-Cat' to get a better idea of the progression of their relationship. Coming next, 'The Little Bunny-Rabbit.' Many thanks to arcticwlfe62543 for suggesting that the girl should pretend to be a monkey--if you have ideas for other animals you'd like to see in this series, post them and I'll try my best!

item.title: The Little Kitty-Cat
item.description: A story of a neighbor girl who dresses up like a kitty-cat, and the man who fancies to her. This is the first of a series of stories; coming soon, 'The Little Puppy-dog,' 'The Little Bunny-rabbit,' and others. As the stories progress, so does their relationship. If you have ideas for other animals you'd like to see, post them and I'll try my best!

item.title: Jim's Lost Girl
item.description: Jim is twenty nine years old and has lost everything. To make matters worse he keeps having the same nightmare over and over. Then a little girl enter his life.

item.title: My Secret Girlfriend
item.description: I am asked to watch little Tomika while my wife takes her mother to the hospital. They are gone all night.

item.title: Rebecca's First Communion
item.description: I guess I should have checked today's schedule.

item.title: The Unaccompanied Minor And The Airline Worker
item.description: Larry is a closet pedophile who has never acted on his urges. Several nights with an unaccompanied minor stranded in a Denver blizzard changes all of that, however; this story has a surprise ending.

item.title: Daddy & Daughter, Dinner & Dance, Part 1
item.description: Dad takes daughter to annual event. Meets another pedo at movie before dance and things get sexier from there.
